summary: Nolan Byrd is a scrawny and shy 9th grader who, like all the other kids, is bullied by Bubba Bixby. Nolan, who has a particular knack with technology, decides to catch Bubba in action.
cast: Devon Werkheiser|Tim Meadows|Daniel Roebuck|Andrew Lewis Caldwell|Dave Coulier|Clare Carey|Francia Raisa|Marisa Guterman|Mindy Sterling|Curtis Armstrong|Kendre Berry|Julianna McCarthy|Justin Lee|Alexandra Krosney|Chad W. keywords: falling down stairs in a wheelchair|student|teacher|wedgie|family relationships
title: Las reglas de Nolan
